survey_brief: This survey collects data on consumer purchasing habits, brand perceptions, and factors influencing sustainable fashion choices.

questions.client_notes: Use standard age brackets for demographic clarity.

questions.question_text: How do you identify your gender?
questions.client_notes: Include inclusive options with an opt-out choice.

script.question_text: How do you identify your gender?

questions.question_text: How often do you purchase sustainable fashion items?
questions.client_notes: Use clear frequency tiers to gauge engagement.

questions.question_text: What factors most influence your decision to purchase sustainable fashion items? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Display if response to Q3 is 'Regularly', 'Occasionally', or 'Rarely'
